definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: J. Simpson's codefendants were in a Las Vegas court today.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森的共同被告今日走上拉斯維加斯法庭。

sentences.english: The Bellagio in Las Vegas has even more to offer.
sentences.chinese: 在拉斯維加斯貝拉吉歐更提供。

sentences.english: It took me one day to fly from Las Vergas to Florida.
sentences.chinese: 從拉斯維加斯到佛羅里達花了一天時間。

sentences.english: Wang will be appearing in Las Vegas with Hong Kong star Joyce Lee as his guest.
sentences.chinese: 王將會和嘉賓香港歌星李樂詩一起出現在拉斯維加斯。

sentences.english: They were married three and a half years ago by an Elvis impersonator in Las Vegas.
sentences.chinese: 他們三年半前在拉斯維加斯的貓王模仿秀上結婚。

sentences.english: Two of O. J. Simpson's codefendants were in a Las Vegas court today.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森的共同被告今日走上拉斯維加斯法庭。

sentences.english: Go ice-fishing for a weekend, or find some strippers in Vegas.
sentences.chinese: 週末去冰上釣魚，或者去拉斯維加斯看脫衣舞演員。

sentences.english: Along with Las Vegas it is suffering from depressed gambling revenues.
sentences.chinese: 隨着拉斯維加斯賭博業的低迷而低迷。

sentences.english: For example, Las Vegas and Macao are very famous gmalbing cities.
sentences.chinese: 比如拉斯維加斯和澳門就是著名的堵城。

sentences.english: Karl, could you send this to LV for me?
sentences.chinese: 卡爾，能幫我把它郵到拉斯維加斯嗎？

sentences.english: In hedonistic Las Vegas, six weeks is enough.
sentences.chinese: 在享樂主義的拉斯維加斯，六個星期就足夠辦完了。

sentences.english: Take a set amount of money and hit the Blackjack and Craps tables in Las Vegas.
sentences.chinese: 帶一筆錢去拉斯維加斯玩一下二十一點和雙骰子。

sentences.english: I brought her to Las Vegas for dinner at Caesars Palace.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我帶着她到拉斯維加斯的凱撒宮去喫飯。

sentences.english: A second class child return to Las Veas.
sentences.chinese: 一張去拉斯維加斯的二等兒童來回票。

sentences.english: I lose my shirt in Las Vegas.
sentences.chinese: 我在拉斯維加斯賭輸了很多錢。

sentences.english: "Viva Las Vegas" and "Jailhouse Rock, " were among the movies.
sentences.chinese: “拉斯維加斯萬歲”和“監獄搖滾”包括在電影中。
